thread.section_title: Statistics Canada, The Daily: Information and communications technology
thread.title: Computer and peripherals price indexes, August 2015
thread.title_full: Computer and peripherals price indexes, August 2015

title: Computer and peripherals price indexes, August 2015
text:
Text - Selected CANSIM tables Related information Previous release PDF (117 KB) Released: 2015-09-25 
In August, prices for commercial computers increased 0.4% from July and consumer computer prices were up 0.7%. In the case of computer peripherals, monitor prices increased 0.5% and printer prices were unchanged. 
Year over year, prices for commercial computers increased 3.0% and prices for consumer computers were up 3.0%. Printer prices were down 0.4% year over year. Note to readers The computer and peripherals price indexes are   changes over time in the price of computers and computer peripherals sold to governments, businesses and consumers.   indexes are   
These indexes are   computer and peripherals price indexes
